review: I cannot get this thing to work. We have an Apple Airport Extreme wifi setup and Chromecast cannot connect to it. Is this a Google v. Apple battle? I have looked online for help. I have found others have the same problem but have not found a solution. I may change this rating if I can get the two to play nice. Apple TV works wonderfully.
author: John "jpearson@wje.com"

review: Set up was okay  but after all it does good.
author: JOHN A MORENO

review: love this device! it's cheap and really easy to set up. Fun, Fun, Fun !!!!
author: Jonathan Holland

review: This little piece of technology is wonderful.  Simple as can be to install.  Simple to use.  There when you want it.  Gone when you don't.  I hate watching any video longer than 5 minutes on my laptop, much less an hour long piece.  With this I just hit Chromecast and it's instantly on my TV.  Chromecast let's you watch all that stuff you might not otherwise.  I think you will like this.
author: George Machun

review: my wife uses it to stream movies to our hdmi tv from her laptop.  she enjoys it .
author: David Sonnier

review: Slight delay and a couple more steps for setup than I imagined, but so easy :)
author: Tim

review: It has opened up the world of YouTube for me
author: joe miller
